channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins SoapUI Pro Functional Testing Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins SoapUI Pro Functional Testing Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2251|2024-08-04T07:01:41.308Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20soapui%20pro%20functional%20testing%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins SoapUI Pro Functional Testing Plugin 1.5 and earlier transmits project passwords in its configuration in plain text as part of job configuration forms, potentially resulting in their exposure.

item.title: CVE-2020-2250|2024-08-04T07:01:41.201Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20soapui%20pro%20functional%20testing%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins SoapUI Pro Functional Testing Plugin 1.3 and earlier stores project passwords unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by attackers with Extended Read permission, or access to the Jenkins controller file system.
